course_description: How do we know what we know about the ancient Greeks and Romans? This course introduces these civilizations through literary and archaeological evidence, emphasizing the intersection of qualitative and quantitative data - languages, architecture, demographics, coins, and political structures.
sections: Class Nbr: 3667, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: S. Blakely, Status: Open
